steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 28-2009. A 68-year-old 
man with fatigue, cough, and peripheral-blood monocytosis.
Dey BR(1), Spitzer TR, Hasserjian RP.

Author information:
(1)Hematology-Oncology Unit, Massachusetts General Hospital, and the Department 
of Medicine, Harvard Medical School, USA.
